name: Cure Moderate Wounds, Mass
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Mythic Adventures © 2013, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell functions like mass cure light wounds, except that it cures 2d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +30).
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同‘群体治疗轻伤 (cure light wounds, mass)’一般，不过它能治疗 {2d8+CL (最高+30)} 点伤害。
